metadata.title: Studios Testimonials Update - Premium Staggered Reveals & Citation Glow

criterion.description: Staggered Quote Reveals with Signature Easing
criterion.details: - Implement GSAP ScrollTrigger animation for testimonial cards - Staggered reveal: Cards enter viewport sequentially (not simultaneously) - Animation properties: * Initial state: opacity: 0, y: 60 (fade-in from below) * Final state: opacity: 1, y: 0 * Stagger timing: 0.2s between each card (total 0.6s for all 3) * Easing: CRE8TIVE_EASINGS.organic (power4.out fallback) - ScrollTrigger configuration: * Trigger: testimonials section container * Start: "top 75%" (cards animate when section 75% into viewport) * toggleActions: "play none none reverse" - **Verification:** Scroll into testimonials section, verify cards reveal sequentially with organic easing - **Reference:** Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-2.md#Story 2.4 Implementation line 517 - **Traceability:** AC-2.42 from tech-spec-epic-2.md line 917

criterion.description: Organic Glow Pulse on Citation Badges (Premium Pattern)
criterion.details: - Add citation badges to each testimonial card (industry/company labels) - Implement subtle glow pulse animation (not static badges) - Glow properties: * SVG filter: glow effect with blur radius 8px * Color: Studios orange (#EA580C) with opacity pulsing 0.3 → 0.6 * Animation: 2s infinite loop with sine wave easing * Pulse timing: Each badge offset by 0.3s (staggered pulse, not synchronized) - Badge styling: Glassmorphism background, small text, bottom-right of card - **Verification:** Inspect badges, verify glow SVG filter animates, measure 2s pulse duration - **Reference:** Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-2.md#Story 2.4 Implementation line 518 - **Traceability:** AC-2.9 from tech-spec-epic-2.md line 874 (citation badges throughout)

- Display 5-star rating with filled star icons - Star styling: Small golden/yellow stars (#F59E0B), inline layout - Micro-animation: Stars scale-in sequentially after card reveals (0.05s stagger per star) - Animation properties: * Initial: scale: 0, opacity: 0 * Final: scale: 1, opacity: 1 * Easing: CRE8TIVE_EASINGS.spring (elastic.out fallback) * Total duration: 0.25s (5 stars × 0.05s) - Position: Top of testimonial card, above quote text - **Verification:** Scroll into view, verify stars appear after card, sequential scale-in visible - **Reference:** Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-2.md#Workflows Story 2.4 line 517

- Use OrganicCard from Epic 2 foundation with shape="blob" (softer than organic/hexagon) - Blob shape: Gentle rounded edges, not sharp geometric - Glassmorphism styling: * backdrop-filter: blur(20px) * bg-opacity: 10% (dark background with transparency) * border: 1px solid white/10 - Glow color: Studios orange (#EA580C) subtle glow on hover - Card elevation: shadow-xl, hover:shadow-2xl transition - Padding: p-8 (generous spacing for quote readability) - **Verification:** Inspect cards, verify blob SVG clip-path shapes (not rectangles or hexagons) - **Reference:** Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-2.md#Premium Component Architecture lines 110-114 - **Traceability:** AC-2.31 from tech-spec-epic-2.md line 906

constraint.rule: Must use OrganicCard with shape="blob" for testimonial cards. Hexagons used in Story 2.2 (platform cards), organic shapes in Story 2.3 (comparison). Blobs differentiate testimonials section and feel softer/more human (appropriate for client quotes).

Citation badge glow pulse MUST use CSS @keyframes animation (not JavaScript requestAnimationFrame). Rationale: Better mobile performance (offloaded to compositor thread), simpler implementation, browser can optimize automatically. Pulse duration: 2s infinite loop, opacity 0.3 → 0.6, staggered by 0.3s per badge.

Testimonial card stagger MUST be 0.2s between each card (total 0.6s for all 3). Rationale: Aligns with Epic 2 timing patterns (0.15s in Story 2.1 for 5 cards, 0.2s feels premium for 3 larger testimonials). Organic easing (power4.out) creates smooth deceleration.

All animations MUST achieve 60fps (≤16.67ms per frame) on Chrome 100+, Firefox 100+, Safari 15+. Use GPU-accelerated properties only (transform, opacity). Add will-change: transform, opacity to animated cards. Glow pulse uses CSS (not JS) for better mobile performance.

ALL testimonial quotes, client names, titles, companies MUST match COPY_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md exactly (word-for-word). No paraphrasing, no creative interpretation. Section header: "What Our Clients Say" (not "Client Testimonials" or "What Clients Say"). 3 testimonials: Kotia, Marina Lab, Advisor Plus PTD (in that order).

Mobile (375px): 1 column stack. Tablet (768px): 2 columns grid (3rd card wraps below). Desktop (1024px+): 3 columns grid. Gap: gap-8 between cards. All animations preserved on mobile (no simplified fallbacks - animations already performant with CSS glow pulse and GPU-accelerated GSAP).

ALL GSAP animations MUST use gsap.context() with cleanup (or @gsap/react useGSAP hook). Pattern: useEffect(() => { const ctx = gsap.context(() => { /* animations */ }, containerRef); return () => ctx.revert(); }, []). CRITICAL for preventing memory leaks when component unmounts.

interface.name: OrganicCard
interface.signature: OrganicCard({ shape, glowColor, morphing, morphIntensity, className, children })
interface.description: Epic 2 foundation component for SVG-masked blob shapes with optional morphing and glow
interface.signature: OrganicCard({ shape: 'blob' | 'hexagon' | 'organic' | 'floating', glowColor?: string, morphing?: boolean, morphIntensity?: number, className?: string, children: React.ReactNode })
interface.usage: Use shape="blob" for testimonial cards. Apply glowColor="#EA580C" (Studios orange) for hover glow. No morphing needed (static blob shapes for testimonials).

interface.name: CRE8TIVE_EASINGS
interface.description: Signature easing curves for premium animations
interface.usage: Use CRE8TIVE_EASINGS.organic for staggered card reveals (AC #3). Use CRE8TIVE_EASINGS.spring for star rating scale-in (AC #5).

interface.name: useGSAP
interface.description: Official GSAP React hook with automatic cleanup (alternative to manual gsap.context())
interface.usage: Recommended pattern for GSAP animations in React components. Auto-reverts on unmount (no manual cleanup needed). Replaces manual gsap.context() + ctx.revert() pattern.
